code: import{sendMessageActionCreator,updateNewMessageTextActionCreator}from"../../redux/dialogsReducer";import Dialog from"./Dialog";import{connect}from"react-redux";var mapStateToStore=function mapStateToStore(state){return{dialogsPage:state.dialogsPage};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{addMessage:function addMessage(){return dispatch(sendMessageActionCreator());},updateNewMessageText:function updateNewMessageText(text){return dispatch(updateNewMessageTextActionCreator(text));}};};var DialogContainer=connect(mapStateToStore,mapDispatchToProps)(Dialog);export default DialogContainer;
